basic_information.scholarship_notes: Madeline Balsiger awarded in Spring 2020. KR
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Barbara Norman Scholarship

description: This scholarship provides aid to a graduating senior who is a Mass Communication major in order to purchase clothing for job interviews. Dr. Barbara Norman was a faculty member at UCO for 35 years and served as the chair of the Department of Communication for 23 years. Eligibility Requirements Mass communications major Graduating senior in the spring that the award is given

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
